title: Bug 2345 - Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open
description: Bug 2345 - When attempting to open a file with a different type of editor while the file is already open, the action has no effect.
OB: When I have a file open in the editor and try to open the same file with a different editor by using the 'Open With' option, nothing happens. The editor remains the same.
EB: When I have a file open in the editor and try to open the same file with a different editor by using the 'Open With' option, a new editor window should open with the selected editor for the file.
SR:
1. Open a file in the editor.
2. Select the file in the Navigator.
3. Right-click on the file and choose 'Open With...'
4. From the list of available editors, select a different editor.
5. Verify that a new editor window opens with the selected editor and displays the file's content.

NOTE: This issue can be reproduced by following the steps described in the bug description section (1GEWMOZ).
